Package game

Class GameSingleThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.GameSingleThread
  • public class GameSingleThread
extends java.lang.Object
    ' NOTE: PREFER GameThreadSafe OVER THIS IMPLEMENTATION. This creates the QWOP game using the Box2D library. This operates on the primary classloader. This means that multiple instances of this class will interfere with others due to static information inside Box2D. GameThreadSafe uses a separate classloader for each instance and can be done in multithreaded applications. However, dealing with all the reflection in GameThreadSafe is really annoying. Hence, this class is more readable.
    Author:
    matt
